name: Jump Drive (itch) (RRGamesAU)
description:
Welcome to Jump Drive, a top-down space exploration and bullet-hell game. Jump Drive immerses the player in a story unlike any other, instead of fighting to save the universe, you already have, you just need to find a way home and claim your fame and glory. To do this you’ll leverage your talents as the greatest pilot in the universe and fly your powerful ship The Serenity, to explore vast unknown locations in anti-space and battle giant enemies in hectic bullet hell boss fights. You will feel powerful and capable but always on the edge, not knowing when you will find drive energy for your ship or what enemy will be waiting at the other side of your next Jump.
